sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1317506_reservei.ReserveItUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>ReserveItUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var ReserveItUtils = Class.create();
ReserveItUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    type: 'ReserveItUtils',
	getRoomRate: function() {
        var roomId = this.getParameter('sys_id');
        var roomGR = new GlideRecord('room_table'); // Replace 'room_table' with the actual table name of the room record
        if (roomGR.get(roomId)) {
            return roomGR.getValue('room_rate');
        } else {
            return null;
        }
    }
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ignashuu</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-14 17:03:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>a05bc9a393c60210292f73118bba1006</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ReserveItUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ReserveIt" source="x_1317506_reservei">309a10ee93210210292f73118bba109e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ReserveIt">309a10ee93210210292f73118bba109e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a05bc9a393c60210292f73118bba1006</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ignashuu</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-14 17:03:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
